name: vercel-llm-api (ading2210)
description: [项目级] A reverse engineered Python API wrapper for the Vercel AI Playground, which provides free access to many large language models without needing an account.。来源: https://github.com/ading2210/vercel-llm-api

genes.title: 项目概述
genes.content:
A reverse engineered Python API wrapper for the Vercel AI Playground, which provides free access to many large language models without needing an account.

来源: https://github.com/ading2210/vercel-llm-api
语言: Python
Stars: 184

genes.title: 项目结构
genes.content:
LICENSE
README.md
examples
examples/chat.py
examples/generate.py
examples/models.py
setup.py
vercel-llm-api
vercel-llm-api/src

genes.title: 核心特性
genes.content:
- Download the available models
 - Generate text
 - Generate chat messages
 - Set custom parameters
 - Stream the responses
